data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Kokrajhar, Assam, India.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kokrajhar, Assam, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the county of Kokrajhar, Assam, India.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Kokrajhar.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Kokrajhar, Assam, India.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Ranabhat people might believe through him.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Kokrajhar.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, to the people of Kokrajhar you say, "If you wait for Me, I will work on your behalf."
data.verse: For from of old men have not heard, nor perceived by the ear, neither has the eye seen a God besides you, who works for him who waits for him.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kokrajhar, Assam, India has a population of 887,100.

We estimate Kokrajhar has 9,758 people who might know Jesus, 10,763 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 866,578 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Kokrajhar, Assam, India.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
